markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Gibtas Bounder](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1045)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A full-grown gibtas uses its powerful legs and rubbery body to bound great distances. Most gibtases remain solitary, unless bonded with a creature.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Gibtas_GibtasBounder.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Gibtas Bounder](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1045)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 76

**Immunities**
acid

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +15 ([deadly 1d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 piercing plus 1d6 [persistent acid](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spit +14 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** 1d6 acid plus 1d6 [persistent acid](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and 1d6 acid [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage

**Bouncing Slam** <actions string="Single Action" />  The gibtas [Leaps](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) toward a Medium or smaller creature, landing in the creature's space and [Shoving](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the creature. If the Shove fails, the gibtas bounces out of the target's square to an adjacent square of the target's choosing.

**Pinning Chomp** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The gibtas's last action was a Bouncing Slam and the gibtas successfully [Shoved](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the target; **Effect** The gibtas attempts to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) the target of its Bouncing Slam, then makes a jaws Strike against the target. The Trip and Strike both count against the gibtas's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-213" />
name: Gibtas Bounder
